descriptionHtml:
Dark Brotherhood Black Hand Amulet (NoneReplacer)

This is an Amulet (standalone) which uses the mesh and texture of the ZenitharAmulet.
Texture is edited by me.

There is one .esp which contains four different Amulets, they all can be forged
at the smithy.

1. The unechanted Amulet is called BlackHandAmulet (Description: Hail Sithis!) 
   and is enchantable.

2. The enchanted BlackHandAmulet has the same Enchantment (and Description) like 
   the GauldurAmulet. 

3. This Amulet is called AncientBlackHandAmulet (Description: AncientShroudedArmor 
   of Gauldur) and has the Stats of a fullset AncientShroudedArmor AND the Gauldur
   Amulet. (For people who want to use a better LightArmor and want the benefits of 
   the AncientShroudedArmor and the GauldurAmulet).

4. The same as the AnientBlackHandAmulet (Description: Amulet of AncientShroudedArmor)
   WITHOUT the Gauldur effect.

Attention:
 
   In Menus the Amulets shows up different (ZenitharAmulet and GoldNecklace), this is 
   because i don\'t get it where to set Menu and World Meshes with skyedit.
   InGame the Amulets shows up correct.

Manual Install:

extract .7z archive in your data folder located in your Skyrim main folder and activate 
the WastsBlackHandAmulet.esp.

OR (recommended):

install it with download manager or nmm

Have Fun!

My other Mods:

PentagramAmulet: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7054
DraugrsNoGlowingEyes http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6062
author: Wast1980
